item.title: Contact
item.description: I’d be more than happy to discuss all kinds of topics around engineering, productivity, product development, side projects, time management and more. Feel free to reach out to me via: Email Messenger

item.title: Talks & Slides
item.description: I consider public speaking as one of the most important parts of my knowledge sharing journey. It’s been a fear that I’ve managed to overcome. A challenge that paid off well multiple times in a form of people I’ve met, insights I’ve gathered and lessons I’ve learned. Below you can find a summary of talks I’ve been working on over the last couple of years. ðŸ“Š Slides Front-End Tooling - Tales, Legends and Myths ðŸ“… 04.

item.title: Hi there!
item.description: Welcome to develop <YOURSELF/>, a place for ambitious product engineers. My name is Przemek Smyrdek. I’m an engineering team lead, front-end specialist and knowledge sharing advocate. This is my personal space to share all kinds of insights around engineering, productivity, team work and well being. To give you few hints about my projects and activity, please visit the following links: Writing: Increment.com Open Source: GitHub Online courses: Opanuj JavaScript Work Experience: LinkedIn
